info.author: Ryan Kraus
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
VarEvents

Event raising variables.

VarEvents is is a Python module that provides a 
lightweight solution for responding to changes 
in variable values. It allows event handlers to 
subscribe to variable events.

Out of the box, it will allow functions to be 
called when a variable changes, increments, or 
decrements. Additional events may also be 
easily defined.

For more information, visit the Autimucus website.

AUTHOR: Ryan Kraus
DATE: 2/2014
EMAIL: automicus@gmail.com
WEBSITE: http://automic.us
info.name: VarEvents
info.summary: Python module to create variables that can raise custom events.
info.html_description:
VarEvents

Event raising variables.

VarEvents is is a Python module that provides a lightweight solution for responding to changes in variable values. It allows event handlers to subscribe to variable events.

Out of the box, it will allow functions to be called when a variable changes, increments, or decrements. Additional events may also be easily defined.

For more information, visit the Autimucus website.
